presetNotes:
- Pre-summon a waterfiend pouch and place the scrolls inside it.

- Assumes all Mattock precision upgrades are purchased from the Archaeology Guild Shop

equipmentSlots.label: masterarchaeologistshat
equipmentSlots.name: Master archaeologist's hat
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: 6% bonus experience, unlimited teleports to archaeological dig sites and collectors if the entire master archaeologist' outfit is equipped

equipmentSlots.label: archcape
equipmentSlots.name: Archaeology master cape
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Skill cape perk provides 5–15% of progress to the next discovery when discovering an artefact

equipmentSlots.label: gote
equipmentSlots.name: Grace of the elves
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
New and partially-used Signs of the Porter can charge the necklace up to 500 charges, enabling full functionality while worn

This causes most gathered items to automatically teleport to the player's bank, consuming one charge per item, Sign of the Porter charges will send archaeology materials to the material storage, not the primary bank

While training a gathering skill with the necklace equipped, a Seren spirit has a 10% chance to spawn on the first eligible XP drop each minute, lasting 30 seconds 

Interacting with the spirit deposits a random rare drop into the player's bank

equipmentSlots.label: guildmastertonysmattock
equipmentSlots.name: Guildmaster Tony's mattock
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Can substitute with the Mattock of Time and Space

Perks: Honed 6 Prosper + Fortune 3 Imp Souled 3

equipmentSlots.label: balarakssashbrush
equipmentSlots.name: Balarak's sash brush
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Provides passive boosts to excavation success rate and mattock base precision, as well as occasionally finding additional materials. An additional bonus is given for following the time sprite

equipmentSlots.label: hsr
equipmentSlots.name: Hazelmere's signet ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Increases quality & quantity of Catalyst of alteration procs

Can substitute with any T4 luck

equipmentSlots.label: scriptureofbik
equipmentSlots.name: Scripture of Bik
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: For additional clues through Catalyst of alteration procs

inventorySlots.label: elvenshard
inventorySlots.name: Ancient elven ritual shard
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
When activated, will restore 37.5% of the player's total Prayer points over 30 seconds

It has a 5-minute cooldown and can be activated an infinite number of times, unaffected by the holy wrench or Reverence aura

inventorySlots.label: potionreservoir2
inventorySlots.name: Potion reservoir (inactive)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: When spirit attraction is used on an active reservoir, it will fill up and automatically consume the potion 1–15 seconds before the potion's effects would expire

inventorySlots.label: spiritattractionflask
inventorySlots.name: Spirit attraction flask (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Automatically collects automatically collects Seren Spirits & Catalyst of alteration procs from the Scripture of Bik

inventorySlots.label: hispecmonocle4
inventorySlots.name: Hi-spec monocle
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Wearing the monocle grants a buff that gives a 20% increase in base mattock precision for 20 minutes, or 30 minutes if the full master archaeologist's outfit is worn

inventorySlots.label: spiritattractionflask
inventorySlots.name: Spirit attraction flask (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Automatically collects automatically collects Seren Spirits & Catalyst of alteration procs from the Scripture of Bik

inventorySlots.label: cluebag
inventorySlots.name: Charos' clue carrier
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Any clue scrolls received while training Archaeology, from the Scripture of Bik and the Prosper perk, will be automatically stored in the clue carrier if it is worn or in the inventory

inventorySlots.label: porterVII
inventorySlots.name: Sign of the porter VII
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: The item has 50 charges, which allow the player to transport items directly to the bank

inventorySlots.label: waterfiend
inventorySlots.name: Binding contract (waterfiend)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Grants a 5% chance while training to duplicate the gained artefact and store it within itself

inventorySlots.label: waterfiendscrolls
inventorySlots.name: Waterfiend scroll (Straight Flush)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Allows the player to teleport all items stored within the familiar's inventory to the player's bank at the cost of 6 special move points

primaryRelics.label: flowstate
primaryRelics.name: Flow State
primaryRelics.description: 20% increase to Archaeology excavation precision at the expense of receiving no soil
